    • Method Detail

      • addServers

        public static void addServers​(int numOfServers)
        Create a list of (numOfServers) servers
        Parameters:
        numOfServers - number of servers

      • generateEvents

        public static void generateEvents​(int numOfCustomers,
                                  int seed,
                                  double arrivalRate,
                                  double serviceRate)
        Generates a queue of all arriveEvents. Creates a RandomGenerator, then while there are remaining customer(s): 1) Create a customer with id and timeNow 2) Add an ArriveEvent with timeNow and the customer 3) Update timeNow to timeNow + interArrivalTime

      • simulate

        public static void simulate()

      • allocateServer

        public static void allocateServer​(Customer c)
        Calls either serveNow, serveLater, or removes the current arriveEvent and creates a leaveEvent. 1) While the customer has no server, requests for each server in serverList to serve customer now
        2) While the customer has no server, requests for each server in serverList to serve customer later
        3) If the customer has no server after 1 and 2, the customer leaves, and exits the queue

      • getRG

        public static cs2030.simulator.RandomGenerator getRG()
